values: Measures of Faith, Gifts of Grace, Ministry in Small GroupsMeasures of Faith, Gifts of Grace, Ministry in Small Groups

God means to get the glory for all things, including the ministry of small groups. We get the gift, the help, and the blessing, but God gets the glory.God means to get the glory for all things, including the ministry of small groups. We get the gift, the help, and the blessing, but God gets the glory.
